This DIY pillow mist is so easy to make, and it's a nice way to freshen up your bedding in between washes! Add 2 Tbsp of vodka or rubbing alchohol to a 500 ml spray bottle. Add 50-60 drops of essential oil, then fill the remainder of the bottle with distilled water. Give the bottle a good shake, and then you're DIY pillow mist is ready to use! Spray it on your bed linens in between washes to give your bedding a refresh. I love using lavender essential oil, but you can play with differerent oils for different effects.
